attributes.action: Education of Black History Within British Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is an indefinite need, our children black & white have become ignorant to the understanding of Black History.
I am 24. When i was in school I believed that there was no Black inventors. Only growing older, being taught from the family home I had realised Black people have done a great deal. This should be recognised within schools.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
